title: Navigation Menu Item
description: A navigation menu item that can be assigned to navigation menus.

id.description: The unique ID of the navigation menu item.

contextId.description: The journal, press or preprint server ID. Use 0 for site-level items.

type.description: The type of navigation menu item (e.g., NMI_TYPE_CUSTOM, NMI_TYPE_ABOUT).

title.description: The title of the navigation menu item.

localizedTitle.description: The localized title of the navigation menu item.

content.description: The content/body of the navigation menu item (for custom page items).

path.description: The URL path for custom navigation menu items.

queryParams.description: Query parameters to append to the navigation menu item URL.

url.description: The computed URL for this navigation menu item.

remoteUrl.description: The remote URL for external link items.

seq.description: The sequence order of the navigation menu item.

titleLocaleKey.description: The locale key for the default title (used for system-defined items).
